# DHTMLX Pivot

For detailed instructions on how to configure DHTMLX Pivot, please refer to our documentation: https://docs.dhtmlx.com/pivot/how-to-start/.

You can integrate DHTMLX Pivot into your projects via npm by running the following commands:

```bash
npm config set @dhx:registry https://npm.dhtmlx.com
npm i @dhx/trial-pivot
```

If you are using Yarn, use the following commands:

```bash
yarn config set @dhx:registry https://npm.dhtmlx.com
yarn add @dhx/trial-pivot
```

These commands will install the trial version of DHTMLX Pivot.
If you have a commercial license and would like to use npm, please contact our support team for further instructions.
